name: Slink's Adventure
description:
You play as Slink, a dude (dude-et...? THING???) that lives in a world with others like them. They all have hats and ties but one day the evil Blink steals the world's hats and ties, but he forgets a certain blocky boi's hat... yours. Now it is up to you to defeat Blink and take back all the hats and ties! 

There are many enemies, but can you defeat them without directly hurting them? Slink is after all a pacifist!

This game is also available on hacked Nintendo Switches if you have atmosphere installed. Check my github repo of the source code to see how to play it. Github repo
